scripts.build: tsc && vite build && cp -r functions dist/
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=woodstock-results
scripts.deploy:skip-check: npm run build:skip-check && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=woodstock-results
scripts.deploy:dev: cp public/_redirects.dev public/_redirects && npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=woodstock-results-dev --branch=dev && git restore public/_redirects
